example.parse: (TOP (S (S (CONJ ثُمَّ) (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_1S أَنا)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS لَيْسَ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-PRD (TYPO ضدد) (NP (DET+NOUN الٱِنْتِقاد))))) (CONJ فَ) (S (NP-TPC-2 (NP (DEM_PRON ها)) (NP (PRON_1S أَنا))) (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I أَنْتَقِدُ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الأَزْهَر)) (PP (PREP فِي) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG هَجمَة) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (DET+NOUN النِقاب)))))))))))
